Generation V.Black: The energy that burns inside it enables it to move, but no one has yet been able to identify this energy.
Generation V.White: These Pokémon are thought to have been created by the science of an ancient and mysterious civilization.
Generation V.Black 2: Ancient science fashioned this Pokémon from clay. It's been active for thousands of years.

Generation VI.X: The energy that burns inside it enables it to move, but no one has yet been able to identify this energy.

Generation VI.Omega Ruby: The energy that burns inside it enables it to move, but no one has yet been able to identify this energy.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Ancient science fashioned this Pokémon from clay. It's been active for thousands of years.

Generation VII.Ultra Sun: Its movements are powered by a mysterious energy. It has continued to move since ancient times, so its power may soon run out.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Although ancient people apparently built it by working with clay, the source of its energy is unclear.

Generation VIII.Sword: They were sculpted from clay in ancient times. No one knows why, but some of them are driven to continually line up boulders.
Generation VIII.Shield: This Pokémon was created from clay. It received orders from its master many thousands of years ago, and it still follows those orders to this day.

Generation IX.Scarlet: These Pokémon are thought to have been created by the science of an ancient and mysterious civilization.
Generation IX.Violet: Its movements are powered by a mysterious energy. It has continued to move since ancient times, so its power may soon run out.
